quest.name: Secret in the Box
journal:
 Quest Sync
The mysterious maiden regards you with interest.
objectives: Solve the riddles in the letter to obtain keys.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYWOMAN04317
dialogue.text: You are Forename Surname, are you not? I've been looking for you.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYWOMAN04317
dialogue.text: I'm an adventurer too, and I've been tasked with delivering this letter and box to you. Though I can't say who sent them, rest assured that my client means you no ill.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYWOMAN04317
dialogue.text: My work is done, so I'll leave you to it, but I suggest you start by reading the letter.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Should you choose to undertake this quest, know that guidance from the journal, duty list, and map will be limited. You will need to read the text carefully and decipher the clues to determine your course of action.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The box is locked tight.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYLETTER04317
dialogue.text:
(-Unsigned Letter-)Dear Forename,
There is a gift for you in the box─if you can open it.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYLETTER04317
dialogue.text: (-Unsigned Letter-)To do so, you must acquire three keys, the keepers of which are somewhere in Sharlayan.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYLETTER04317
dialogue.text: (-Unsigned Letter-)Solve the following riddles to find them. And do try to have fun. This is a game, after all.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYLETTER04317
dialogue.text:
(-Unsigned Letter-)Towards wisdom aspiring, a keeper doth gaze,
By young minds inquiring and new trails blazed.
Yet the mind is a muscle, in rest it doth grow,
So let all embrace slumber, the better to know.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYLETTER04317
dialogue.text:
(-Unsigned Letter-)By life ever-flowing, a keeper doth wait,
Clutching a prize, his hunger to sate.
Yet no prize is so coveted as one golden-hued,
The mention of which is never thought rude.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYLETTER04317
dialogue.text:
(-Unsigned Letter-)Blessed by the nymphai, a keeper doth stand,
Enthralled in a tale, a book in his hand.
Yet evocative as letters on parchment may be,
'Tis words said and heard which impel destiny.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Find the three keepers by using the hints in the letter. You may review the letter in your inventory.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You cannot open the box without all three keys.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYSTUDENT04317
dialogue.text: <yawn> I worked on a report all night, and it's all I can do not to doze off in class... I thought the fresh air might help to wake me up.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYSTUDENT04317
dialogue.text: I've been waiting for you, Forename. Here, my master bade me give you this key.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYSTUDENT04317
dialogue.text: To go so far as to disguise himself as a woman... It shows how much he wanted to meet you in person.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYSTUDENT04317
dialogue.text: Anyway, I've played my part, so I'll return to my training. Enjoy the rest of the game.

dialogue.name: SAYTODO
dialogue.text: golden acorn

dialogue.name: MYSTERYBOY04317
dialogue.text: Well done, my friend! From the tales I heard about you, I expected you'd find me in short order─and you did.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYBOY04317
dialogue.text: Heard from who, you ask? Oh, just a man I admire. It was due to his influence that I decided to train under the same master. What joy to see him again after all these years!

dialogue.name: MYSTERYBOY04317
dialogue.text: My disguise, I chose because I felt it'd be a good match for him. Quite convincing, don't you think?

dialogue.name: MYSTERYBOY04317
dialogue.text: Ah, but before I forget─here's your key. I'll let you get back to the game, but when you have a moment, I'd love to hear some of your tales!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Could this nutkin be one of the keepers? Perhaps you should review the letter...

dialogue.name: IZUMI
dialogue.text: Greetings, Forename. That you've sought me out means you've read the letter─and solved the riddle besides.

dialogue.name: IZUMI
dialogue.text: Of all our master's pupils, your comrade is the least poetic by far. But that's never stopped him from trying to woo the ladies with song. He truly is hopeless.

dialogue.name: IZUMI
dialogue.text: Still, it's good to see him hale and whole. From what Master tells us, he's been through a lot.

dialogue.name: IZUMI
dialogue.text: The next time you see him, do pass along my regards. And here, of course, is your key.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The keys unlock the box, which you open to reveal your gift─along with another letter.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYLETTER04317
dialogue.text:
(-Enclosed Letter-)Dear Forename,
Allow me to congratulate you for solving the riddles. As promised, the gift is yours to take.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYLETTER04317
dialogue.text: (-Enclosed Letter-)A long time ago, Master Louisoix left a little troublemaker in my care. At his behest, I taught the boy everything I knew in the ways of survival and infiltration.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYLETTER04317
dialogue.text: (-Enclosed Letter-)After years away from these shores, the boy has returned a man. By the set of his face alone, 'tis plain he has matured greatly.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYLETTER04317
dialogue.text: (-Enclosed Letter-)A product of his time with the Scions, I do not doubt. I thank you for being there for him, and ask that you continue to do so.

dialogue.name: MYSTERYLETTER04317
dialogue.text: (-Enclosed Letter-)Lastly, I ask that you forgive me for not saying this directly. In spite of myself, I've never been good at expressing heartfelt sentiments in person, hence this letter. The manner of its delivery, at the very least, I wished to make interesting, and I hope you derived some enjoyment from it.
